images.description: The splash screen for the Destiny 2 Lightfall expansion.
Levi worked on Tormentor features such as the dark-harvest ability.
Levi worked on various types of path-finding features, such as steering and strafing for the Thresher.
Levi worked on features for the Nezarec raid boss.
Levi worked on many other combatant features, such as the cabal jetpack bombardment ability.
Levi's name is in the credits!
